headline.main: Anti-Semitic Assaults Rise in United States to 56 Incidents: Report
headline.print_headline: Anti-Semitic Assaults Rise in United States to 56 Incidents: Report

docs.snippet: Anti-Semitic assaults rose dramatically in the United States last year to 56, and the overall number of hateful incidents targeting Jews increased by 3 percent, the Anti-Defamation League said in a report on Wednesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Anti-Semitic assaults rose dramatically in the United States last year to 56, and the overall number of hateful incidents targeting Jews increased by 3 percent, the Anti-Defamation League said in a report on Wednesday.

headline.main: Costumed Characters Under New Rules in NY's Times Square
headline.print_headline: Costumed Characters Under New Rules in NY's Times Square

docs.snippet: NEW YORK - Costumed characters, painted ladies, bus tour ticket sellers and street performers will no longer be allowed to roam free in New York's Times Square but will be restricted to special zones....
docs.lead_paragraph: NEW YORK - Costumed characters, painted ladies, bus tour ticket sellers and street performers will no longer be allowed to roam free in New York's Times Square but will be restricted to special zones.

headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Fared on Wednesday
headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Fared on Wednesday

docs.snippet: U.S. stocks gave up early gains to finish lower Wednesday as energy companies sank with the price of oil and weak quarterly reports weighed down technology companies....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. stocks gave up early gains to finish lower Wednesday as energy companies sank with the price of oil and weak quarterly reports weighed down technology companies.

headline.main: Some U.S. Stock Options Traders Say Brexit Fears Overdone
headline.print_headline: Some U.S. Stock Options Traders Say Brexit Fears Overdone

docs.snippet: The run-up to Britain's referendum on European Union membership has revived volatility expectations for U.S. stocks after months of torpor, but some traders in the options market have been banking on a return of calm....
docs.lead_paragraph: The run-up to Britain's referendum on European Union membership has revived volatility expectations for U.S. stocks after months of torpor, but some traders in the options market have been banking on a return of calm.

headline.main: Oi Rivals Seen Gaining While Bankruptcy Puts Brazil M&A Hopes on Hold
headline.print_headline: Oi Rivals Seen Gaining While Bankruptcy Puts Brazil M&A Hopes on Hold

docs.snippet: Brazilian phone carrier Oi SA faces long odds in trying to reorganize under the country's complex bankruptcy law, offering rivals a chance to bolster their market dominance while leaving hopes for consolidation in the $45 billion industry on hold ...
docs.lead_paragraph: Brazilian phone carrier Oi SA faces long odds in trying to reorganize under the country's complex bankruptcy law, offering rivals a chance to bolster their market dominance while leaving hopes for consolidation in the $45 billion industry on hold for now.

headline.main: Las Vegas Lands Expansion Franchise as NHL Adds 31st Team
headline.print_headline: Las Vegas Lands Expansion Franchise as NHL Adds 31st Team

docs.snippet: The National Hockey League decided on Wednesday to roll the dice on expanding to Las Vegas, making the league the first to put a major professional sports team in the resort city known primarily for gambling....
docs.lead_paragraph: The National Hockey League decided on Wednesday to roll the dice on expanding to Las Vegas, making the league the first to put a major professional sports team in the resort city known primarily for gambling.
